title: Sounds are far too loud
body: As the title states, the client appears to me far too loud, in all instances (specially during the draft picking) and I can't seem to find any option to tweak the client's sound. Lowering the sound of my PC would mean I would need to turn it back up during the game or when I am with friends. I have been simply muting it lately, has this option not been implemented yet or am I just a little more {{champion:64}} (blind) than what my doctor told me? Thank you for your time :D

replies.body: More audio settings will be added. I don't know with which patch, but it is being worked on.
Lovely! This has been a problem with the old client too.
Yeah, for me the draft pick stuff is really loud compared to everything else. Hoping volume sliders will be added, and the draft pick volume will be changed to match the rest of the client.
